Before World War I Hervé was one of the most strident voices within both [MASK] socialism and the Second International, advocating violent, revolutionary means to prevent war.

On 30 June 1941, eight days after Germany's attack on the Soviet Union, Bandera in Lviv proclaimed an independent [MASK] state.
